Text:
Great Upload IceBane!I used to watch these when I was a kid.Any chance you will be posting the second
or third ninja turtles movies?Thanks for your hard work!

Thanks for all the 3 Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles movies, IceBane! I'd be really awesome if you could do, at some point, the new animated one: TMNT (2007) in order to complete the Blu-Ray film collection: http://www.blu-ray.com/movies/Teenage-Mutant-Ninja-Turtles-Film-Collection-Blu-ray/4096/
Only you can make this happen! Thanks again!
